reviewsJson.markdown:
* **Setup:** Velocity 24 gauge twisted Nichrome & Kanthal Half Wick @105 Watts
* **Testing:** (TPA) Bubblegum @ 10%. Max VG, steeped 7 days.
* **Caution:** * None
* **Flavor Description:** (From mnf website) A Very nice Bubblegum. (From me) This is essentially a pink bubblegum, but more on the chalky realm. It is similar to Bazooka Joe, Double Bubble, gum balls etc. 
* **Off-flavors:** It just has a chalky taste, but that goes along with the bubblegum nature.
* **Throat Hit:**1/10
* **Uses & Pairings:**This would go well with pretty mmuch any fruit. you could change your bubblegum to any fruit, mint, or anything like that. I would not suggest putting this in bakeries, but to each his own.   
* **Notes:** This is the first Bubblegum flavoring I every got, back about 4 years ago and I still keep some on my flavor rack, if that helps you decide if this is a good bubblegum or not.

If you are looking for more mixing related content subscribe to my [Youtube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcfR6mXMRm-Iu3psoDrxGyA)

Keep Mixing!
reviewsJson.author: cloudstatevapor
reviewsJson.title: Bubblegum
